purpose: Provide practical examples and templates for developers to learn and implement Azure AI solutions.
principle: Utilizes Azure AI services and tools to demonstrate various AI capabilities through Jupyter Notebooks and code samples.
reusability: Includes reusable Jupyter Notebooks and code samples that can be adapted for different Azure AI use cases.
limitations: Primarily focused on Azure AI services, which may limit applicability to other cloud platforms.
name: azureai-samples
highlight: Official community-driven repository offering a wide range of Azure AI examples and templates.
